entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Baie-James
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:13 PM EST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -10.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Waskaganish Airport 10:00 PM EST Friday 27 January 2023
Temperature: -10.4°C
Pressure: 99.5 kPa
Humidity: 85 %
Wind Chill: -18
Dewpoint: -12.4°C
Wind: SE 17 km/h gust 32 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 21.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning early this evening. Amount 2 cm except 5 cm over southern sections. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 21. Wind chill near minus 33. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Snow. Temperature falling to minus 27 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Snow ending near noon then clearing. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature falling to minus 27 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 33 in the morning and minus 42 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Clear. Low minus 35.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light overnight. Low minus 35. Wind chill minus 42 in the evening and minus 48 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 27 January 2023
